Text: Apni ki recently research paper read korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly understand ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently reference korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently read a research paper? I was thinking whether everything is properly understood. If you come, I can reference confidently.

Text: Apni ki ajke group study session arrange korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab members free ache ki na. Apni gele ami easily join korte parbo.
Target: Will you arrange a group study session today? I was thinking whether all members are free. If you come, I can join easily.

Text: Apni ki recently assignment draft check korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly edited ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently submit korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently checked the assignment draft? I was thinking whether everything is properly edited. If you come, I can submit confidently.

Text: Apni ki ajke project deadline finalize korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab resources ready ache ki na. Apni gele ami smoothly complete korte parbo.
Target: Will you finalize the project deadline today? I was thinking whether all resources are ready. If you come, I can complete smoothly.

Text: Apni ki recently online lecture attend korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly recorded ache ki na. Apni gele ami easily review korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently attended an online lecture? I was thinking whether everything is properly recorded. If you come, I can review easily.

Text: Apni ki ajke assignment peer review korte plan korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly shared ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently feedback dite parbo.
Target: Will you plan a peer review of the assignment today? I was thinking whether everything is properly shared. If you come, I can give feedback confidently.

Text: Apni ki recently online course enrollment complete korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly confirmed ache ki na. Apni gele ami smoothly start korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently completed online course enrollment? I was thinking whether everything is properly confirmed. If you come, I can start smoothly.

Text: Apni ki ajke work report submit korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly documented ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently submit korte parbo.
Target: Will you submit the work report today? I was thinking whether everything is properly documented. If you come, I can submit confidently.

Text: Apni ki recently assignment feedback review korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly understood ache ki na. Apni gele ami smoothly improve korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently reviewed assignment feedback? I was thinking whether everything is properly understood. If you come, I can improve smoothly.

Text: Apni ki ajke lab experiment record korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly noted ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently submit korte parbo.
Target: Will you record the lab experiment today? I was thinking whether everything is properly noted. If you come, I can submit confidently.

Text: Apni ki recently project milestone update korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly logged ache ki na. Apni gele ami easily track korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently updated the project milestone? I was thinking whether everything is properly logged. If you come, I can track easily.

Text: Apni ki ajke team discussion arrange korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab members ready ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently contribute korte parbo.
Target: Will you arrange a team discussion today? I was thinking whether all members are ready. If you come, I can contribute confidently.

Text: Apni ki recently exam schedule check korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly noted ache ki na. Apni gele ami smoothly prepare korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently checked the exam schedule? I was thinking whether everything is properly noted. If you come, I can prepare smoothly.

Text: Apni ki ajke project documentation update korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly recorded ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently finalize korte parbo.
Target: Will you update project documentation today? I was thinking whether everything is properly recorded. If you come, I can finalize confidently.

Text: Apni ki recently assignment peer submission complete korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly uploaded ache ki na. Apni gele ami easily review korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently completed peer submission of the assignment? I was thinking whether everything is properly uploaded. If you come, I can review easily.

Text: Apni ki ajke online workshop attend korben? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly registered ache ki na. Apni gele ami confidently participate korte parbo.
Target: Will you attend an online workshop today? I was thinking whether everything is properly registered. If you come, I can participate confidently.

Text: Apni ki recently project presentation record korechhen? Ami chinta korchilam sab properly saved ache ki na. Apni gele ami smoothly share korte parbo.
Target: Have you recently recorded the project presentation? I was thinking whether everything is properly saved. If you come, I can share smoothly.

Text: Ami apnar theke ekta jinis shikhchi, seta holo shobshomoy positive thaka. Apni amar kache ekta role model.
Target: I have learned one thing from you, and that is to always stay positive. You are like a role model to me.

Text: Apni jodi amar sathe ei project e kaj koren, ami nischit result onek valo hobe. Apnar guidance amar proyojon.
Target: If you work with me on this project, I am sure the result will be much better. I need your guidance.

Text: Ami jani apni khub busy, kintu tarporo apni shobshomoy time ber kore amader help koren. Eta ami onek appreciate kori.
Target: I know you are very busy, but still you always make time to help us. I really appreciate that.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe kalke ekta program e jaben? Apni gele amar confidence aro bere jabe.
Target: Will you go to a program with me tomorrow? If you go, my confidence will increase even more.

Text: Ami khub bhalo lagchhe je apni amar shobshomoy ekta supportive role play koren. Amar mon ektu halka hoye jay apnar kache share korle.
Target: I feel really good that you always play a supportive role for me. My mind feels lighter when I share things with you.

Text: Apni jodi amake ekbar aro clearly bojhaten, ami shotti bujhte partam. Sometimes amar confusion hoye jay.
Target: If you could explain to me once more clearly, I would truly understand. Sometimes I get confused.

Text: Amar mone hoy apni jodi amar place e thakten, tahole same decision niten. Apni shobshomoy logical vabe chinta koren.
Target: I feel that if you were in my place, you would have made the same decision. You always think logically.

Text: Apni amar success er ekta important part, karon apni shobshomoy amake encourage korechhen. Amar confidence onek bereche.
Target: You are an important part of my success because you have always encouraged me. My confidence has grown a lot.

Text: Ajke apni amar sathe ekdom honestly kotha bollan, ami eta khub value kori. Sobshomoy shotti bola easy na.
Target: Today you spoke very honestly with me, and I value that a lot. It is not always easy to speak the truth.

Text: Ami khub khushi je apni amar chhoto achievement keo appreciate koren. Eta amake aro chesta korte inspire kore.
Target: I am very happy that you appreciate even my small achievements. This inspires me to try harder.

Text: Apni ki kalke amar sathe ekbar market e jaben? Amar ekta notun jinis kinar proyojon ache, apnar opinion valuable.
Target: Will you go to the market with me tomorrow? I need to buy something new, and your opinion is valuable.

Text: Amar mone hoy apnar support na thakle ami ekhono eto boro kaj korte partam na. Apni amar jonno ekta strength.
Target: I feel that without your support, I wouldn’t have been able to do such big work. You are a strength for me.

Text: Ami apnar shobshomoy patience dekhe impressed hoyi. Apni jemon shant vabe shob handle koren, seta amar jonno ekta example.
Target: I am always impressed by your patience. The way you handle everything calmly is an example for me.

Text: Apni ajke office e jaben? Ami shunechi ekhane ekta important meeting ache, tai shobai joruri vabe aste hobe. Apni ki already prepare hoyechen?
Target: Are you going to the office today? I heard there is an important meeting, so everyone must come urgently. Have you already prepared?

Text: Apni ki kalke amar bari asben? Ami onekdin dhore apnar shathe kotha bolini. Ekhon ekshathe boshe kotha hole bhalo hobe.
Target: Will you come to my home tomorrow? I haven’t spoken with you for a long time. It would be nice to sit together and talk now.

Text: Apnar health kemon? Dekhte pachhi apni onek tired lagchen. Jodi rest nin, tahole valo hobe.
Target: How is your health? I can see you look very tired. If you take some rest, it will be better.

Text: Apni ki chai ek cup cha? Aajke brishti hochhe, cha khete onek moja lagbe. Amar mone hoy amader ekshathe cha khele bhalo hobe.
Target: Would you like a cup of tea? It’s raining today, so tea will feel very nice. I think it will be good if we have tea together.

Text: Apni ki ajker kaj sesh korechen? Dekhte pachhi ekhono onek file table e pore ache. Ami jodi help kori, tahole apnar kaj easy hobe.
Target: Have you finished today’s work? I see there are still many files on the table. If I help you, your work will become easier.

Text: Apni ki amar shathe bazar jaben? Amar kichu jinis kinte hobe, ekla jawa kothin. Apni gele amar jonne onek shohaj hobe.
Target: Will you go shopping with me? I have to buy some things, and going alone is difficult. If you go, it will be much easier for me.

Text: Apnar mobile ta charge ache তো? Anekdin dhore ami call korte cheshta korchilam. Jodi apni amar call pick korten, tahole amar dorkar puroto hoto.
Target: Is your mobile charged? I had been trying to call you for many days. If you had picked up my call, my need would have been solved.

Text: Apni ki amake ekta favor korte parben? Amar ekta urgent document print korte hobe. Apnar kache jodi printer thake, ami use korte chai.
Target: Can you do me a favor? I urgently need to print a document. If you have a printer, I would like to use it.

Text: Apni ki khabar kheyechen? Ami shunechi ajke onek tasty khabar banano hoyeche. Jodi ekshathe khete boshi, moja beshi hobe.
Target: Have you eaten yet? I heard that very delicious food has been prepared today. If we sit together to eat, it will be more enjoyable.

Text: Apni ki kalke program e jaben? Sekhane onek boro manush asben. Amar mone hoy apnar jonne networking er bhalo opportunity hobe.
Target: Will you attend the program tomorrow? Many important people will be there. I think it will be a good networking opportunity for you.

Text: Apni ajke onek valo lagchen. Amar mone hoy apnar dress ta onek shundor. Jodi apni chaan, ami apnar ekta photo tule dite pari.
Target: You are looking very good today. I think your dress is very beautiful. If you want, I can take a photo of you.

Text: Apni ki amar shathe ek cup coffee khaben? Ami onekdin dhore chinta korchilam apnar shathe boshe kotha bolbo. Coffee khete khete kotha hole moja hobe.
Target: Would you like to have a cup of coffee with me? I’ve been thinking for a long time that I want to sit and talk with you. Talking over coffee will be fun.

Text: Apnar kaj ta onek difficult chhilo, kintu apni khub nicely korechen. Ami apnar effort ke respect kori. Erokom continue korle apni onek boro success paben.
Target: Your work was very difficult, but you did it very nicely. I respect your effort. If you continue like this, you will achieve great success.

Text: Apni ajke kothay jachhen? Dekhte pachhi apni onek busy. Jodi amar shathe thoda time den, tahole ami khushi hobo.
Target: Where are you going today? I see you are very busy. If you give me a little time, I will be happy.

Text: Apni ki amar kotha mon-e rakhben? Ami jani apni onek busy, but amar kotha khub important. Jodi apni follow koren, apnar jonne valo hobe.
Target: Will you remember what I said? I know you are very busy, but what I said is very important. If you follow it, it will be good for you.

Text: Apni ki chinta korchen ajke meeting er jonne? Amader ekta proper presentation dorkar. Jodi apni amar shathe prepare koren, tahole amader jonne easy hobe.
Target: Are you thinking about today’s meeting? We need a proper presentation. If you prepare with me, it will be easier for us.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe ekbar bazar jaben? Amar kichu vegetable kinte hobe. Apni gele amar jonne boro help hobe.
Target: Will you go to the market with me once? I need to buy some vegetables. If you go, it will be a big help for me.

Text: Apni ajke class attend korben তো? Amader teacher bolsen ekta surprise quiz hobe. Jodi apni na jan, problem hote pare.
Target: Will you attend class today? Our teacher said there will be a surprise quiz. If you don’t know, it could be a problem.

Text: Apnar laptop ta onek bhalo. Ami ki ekbar use korte pari? Amar ekta project complete korte hobe, apnar laptop use korle amar kaj easy hobe.
Target: Your laptop is very good. Can I use it once? I have to complete a project, and if I use your laptop, my work will be easier.

Text: Apni ki bus e jachhen na train e? Ami shunechi train ta fast jabe. Apni jodi train e jan, apnar time save hobe.
Target: Are you going by bus or by train? I heard the train will go faster. If you take the train, your time will be saved.

Text: Apni ki amar shathe ekbar hospital e jaben? Amar ekta test korte hobe. Apni jodi jan, amar support hobe.
Target: Will you go with me to the hospital once? I need to do a test. If you go, it will give me support.

Text: Apni ajke onek valo kaaj korechen. Apnar effort ke ami appreciate kori. Jodi apni aro effort den, apni aro boro position e jaben.
Target: You did very good work today. I appreciate your effort. If you give more effort, you will reach a higher position.

Text: Apni ki amake amar study te help korben? Amar exam ashtese, ami onek confused. Jodi apni amar sathe boshen, ami bhalo result korte parbo.
Target: Will you help me in my studies? My exam is coming, and I’m very confused. If you sit with me, I’ll be able to do well.

Text: Apnar kotha shune amar mon khushi hoyeche. Apni amar jonne onek valo kaj korechen. Amar mon theke apnar jonne shubhokamona roilo.
Target: Hearing your words made me happy. You did a very good thing for me. From my heart, I wish you the best.

Text: Apni ki amar shathe ekbar park e jaben? Ami onekdin dhore relax korte chai. Park e ekshathe boshe kotha hole moja hobe.
Target: Will you go to the park with me once? I want to relax for a long time. If we sit in the park and talk, it will be enjoyable.

Text: Apni ajke office e kemon lagchhen? Dekhe khushi lagchhe apni khub busy holeo smile korchen. Ami chinta korchilam apni shob kichu handle korte parben ki na.
Target: How are you feeling at the office today? I am happy to see that even though you are very busy, you are smiling. I was worried if you could handle everything.

Text: Apnar ajker kaj ta khub important, tai ami chinta korchilam apni ready ki na. Apni jodi amar shathe discuss koren, tahole better plan korte parben.
Target: Your work today is very important, so I was thinking if you are ready. If you discuss it with me, you can make a better plan.

Text: Apni ki kalke amar sathe ek cup cha khete chaben? Ami chinta korchilam ajke ekto relax korte hobe. Cha kheye kotha bola amar khub bhalo lagbe.
Target: Will you have a cup of tea with me tomorrow? I thought I should relax a bit today. Talking over tea will make me feel really good.

Text: Ami dekhe khushi hoyechhi apni amar help korte ready achhen. Amar khub dorkar chhilo, tai ami onek thankful. Apni shobshomoy supportive.
Target: I am happy to see that you are ready to help me. I really needed it, so I am very thankful. You are always supportive.

Text: Apni ajke kemon chhilen? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy holeo khabar kheyechen ki na. Shorirer health khub important.
Target: How were you today? I was thinking whether you have eaten even though you are busy. Your health is very important.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe kalke bazar jaben? Amar kichu important jinis kinte hobe. Apni gele amar kaj easy hoye jabe.
Target: Will you go to the market with me tomorrow? I need to buy some important things. If you go, my work will become easier.

Text: Ami dekhe khushi hoyechhi apni ajke onek shundor dress porachen. Apnar style khub bhalo lagchhe. Ami chesta korchi apnar moto dress korte.
Target: I am happy to see that you wore a very beautiful dress today. I really like your style. I am trying to dress like you.

Text: Apni ajke amar sathe ekta meeting korte parben? Ami chinta korchilam apni ready ki na. Apnar opinion amar khub dorkar.
Target: Can you have a meeting with me today? I was wondering if you are ready. Your opinion is very important to me.

Text: Apni ki ajke amar sathe ekta project review korben? Ami chinta korchilam project ta perfect ache ki na. Apni gele idea clear hoye jabe.
Target: Will you review a project with me today? I was worried if the project is perfect. If you come, the idea will become clear.

Text: Ami dekhe khushi hoyechhi apni amar advice follow korchen. Apni amar jonno inspiration, ami chesta korchi apnar moto hote.
Target: I am happy to see that you are following my advice. You are an inspiration to me; I am trying to be like you.

Text: Apni ki ajke raat e ek cup coffee khete chaben? Ami chinta korchilam ekta relaxed time nite hobe. Apnar sathe kotha bola khub enjoyable hobe.
Target: Will you have a cup of coffee tonight? I was thinking of taking some relaxed time. Talking with you will be very enjoyable.

Text: Apni ajke onek busy chhilen, dekhe khushi lagchhe apni shesh porjonto focused chhilen. Apni shobshomoy example set koren.
Target: You were very busy today; I am happy to see that you stayed focused until the end. You always set an example.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe ekta planning session korben? Amar khub dorkar, ami chinta korchilam apni ready ki na. Jodi apni sathe thaken, better decision nite parbo.
Target: Will you have a planning session with me? I really need it, and I was thinking if you are ready. If you stay with me, I can make better decisions.

Text: Apni ki amar shathe ekta short break nite chaben? Ami chinta korchilam ajke onek hectic chhilo. Apnar sathe ekto relax time khub enjoyable hobe.
Target: Will you take a short break with me? I was thinking that today was very hectic. A little relaxed time with you will be very enjoyable.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe ekta document check korte parben? Amar khub dorkar chhilo. Apni gele kaj ta fast shesh hobe.
Target: Can you check a document with me? I really needed it. If you come, the work will finish faster.

Text: Ami dekhe khushi hoyechhi apni amar suggestion accept korchen. Apni amar opinion ke value den, ami grateful.
Target: I am happy to see that you accepted my suggestion. You value my opinion, and I am grateful.

Text: Apni ki ajke amar sathe ekta lunch khete chaben? Ami chinta korchilam apni khabar kheyechhen ki na. Lunch khete kotha bola moja hobe.
Target: Will you have lunch with me today? I was wondering if you have eaten. Talking over lunch will be fun.

Text: Apni ki kalke office e ekta presentation deben? Ami chinta korchilam apni ready ki na. Ami sure apni khub bhalo perform korben.
Target: Will you give a presentation at the office tomorrow? I was thinking if you are ready. I am sure you will perform very well.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe ekta phone call korben? Amar kichu important dorkar, apnar advice amar khub useful hobe.
Target: Will you have a phone call with me? I need something important, and your advice will be very useful to me.

Text: Apni ajke amar sathe ekta quick discussion korben? Ami chinta korchilam amar idea clear ache ki na. Apni gele clear hoye jabe.
Target: Will you have a quick discussion with me today? I was wondering if my idea is clear. If you come, it will become clear.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe ekta small meeting korben? Amar khub dorkar, project ta smoothly shesh korte parbo. Apni gele perfect hobe.
Target: Will you have a small meeting with me? I really need it to finish the project smoothly. If you come, it will be perfect.

Text: Ami dekhe khushi hoyechhi apni amar advice implement korchen. Apni khub supportive, ami chesta korchi best korte.
Target: I am happy to see that you are implementing my advice. You are very supportive, and I am trying to do my best.

Text: Apni ki ajke amar sathe ekta task complete korben? Ami chinta korchilam time hobe ki na. Apni gele easy hobe.
Target: Will you complete a task with me today? I was wondering if there will be enough time. If you come, it will be easier.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe ekta evening walk korben? Ami chinta korchilam ekto relax time nite hobe. Walk korle khub fresh feel hobe.
Target: Will you take an evening walk with me? I was thinking I need to take a little relaxed time. Walking will make me feel fresh.

Text: Apni ki ajke amar sathe ekta short review korben? Amar khub dorkar, apnar feedback amar jonne helpful hobe.
Target: Will you do a short review with me today? I really need it, and your feedback will be helpful for me.

Text: Apni ki amar phone call receive korte parben? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben. Amar kache ekta urgent order request ase, tai apni jodi call koren, ami details explain korte parbo.
Target: Can you receive my phone call? I was thinking you might be busy. I have an urgent order request, so if you call, I can explain the details.

Text: Apni ki recently amar message dekhechen? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben. Ami order confirmation niye sure hote chai, apni jodi reply koren, ami satisfied hobo.
Target: Have you recently seen my message? I thought you might be busy. I want to confirm the order; if you reply, I will be satisfied.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe phone e discuss korte parben? Ami chinta korchilam apni ready ki na. Amar kache onek important product details ache, ami step by step explain korbo.
Target: Can you discuss with me over the phone? I was thinking if you are ready. I have many important product details, and I will explain them step by step.

Text: Apni ki amar call receive korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni meeting e thakben ki na. Amar kache customer order related urgent update ase, ami chinta korte parchi na kibhabe manage korbo.
Target: Will you receive my call? I was thinking you might be in a meeting. I have an urgent customer order update, and I cannot figure out how to manage it.

Text: Apni ki recently order confirmation diyechen? Ami chinta korchilam delivery schedule update ki ase. Ami chesta korchilam apnar sathe phone e discuss korte, jate sob clear hoye.
Target: Have you recently given the order confirmation? I was thinking what the delivery schedule update is. I tried to discuss with you over the phone so everything becomes clear.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe phone e product customization niye kotha bolben? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben ki na. Apni gele ami step by step request explain korte parbo.
Target: Will you talk with me over the phone about product customization? I thought you might be busy. If you come, I can explain the request step by step.

Text: Apni ki recently amar WhatsApp message dekhechen? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben. Ami product delivery niye confirm chai, jodi apni reply koren, ami easy feel korbo.
Target: Have you recently seen my WhatsApp message? I thought you might be busy. I want to confirm product delivery; if you reply, I will feel at ease.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe phone e contact korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni available thakben ki na. Amar kache ekta urgent order update ase, ami chesta korbo step by step explain korte.
Target: Will you contact me over the phone? I was thinking whether you will be available. I have an urgent order update, and I will try to explain step by step.

Text: Apni ki recently order submit korechen? Ami chinta korchilam payment confirmation hoyeche ki na. Ami chesta korchilam apnar sathe phone e verify korte, jate sob process smoothly hoy.
Target: Have you recently submitted the order? I was thinking whether the payment confirmation has been done. I tried to verify with you over the phone so that everything goes smoothly.

Text: Apni ki amar call receive korte parben ajke? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben. Amar kache product return process niye kichu questions ase, ami step by step explain korbo.
Target: Can you receive my call today? I was thinking you might be busy. I have some questions about the product return process, and I will explain step by step.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe phone e order details discuss korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni ready ki na. Amar kache customer specifications ache, ami chinta korchilam apni sab detail clearly bujhben.
Target: Will you discuss order details with me over the phone? I was thinking whether you are ready. I have customer specifications, and I thought you will understand all details clearly.

Text: Apni ki amar WhatsApp call accept korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben. Amar kache urgent product update ase, ami chesta korbo sob step explain korte, jate kono confusion na thake.
Target: Will you accept my WhatsApp call? I thought you might be busy. I have an urgent product update, and I will try to explain every step so that there is no confusion.

Text: Apni ki recently product delivery receive korechen? Ami chinta korchilam condition thik ache ki na. Ami chinta korchilam apni phone e feedback diben ki na.
Target: Have you recently received the product delivery? I was thinking whether the condition is okay. I thought you would give feedback over the phone.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe phone e ekta urgent discussion korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni meeting e busy thakben. Amar kache order cancellation niye update ase, ami explain korte chai.
Target: Will you have an urgent discussion with me over the phone? I thought you might be busy in a meeting. I have an update about order cancellation and want to explain it.

Text: Apni ki recently amar message reply korechen? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben ki na. Ami product shipment niye clear hoye jete chai, jate kono problem na hoy.
Target: Have you recently replied to my message? I was thinking you might be busy. I want to get clarity about the product shipment so that there is no problem.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe phone e ekta call korte parben? Ami chinta korchilam apni available thakben ki na. Amar kache urgent order status ase, ami step by step explain korte chai.
Target: Can you have a phone call with me? I was thinking whether you will be available. I have an urgent order status, and I want to explain it step by step.

Text: Apni ki recently online order place korechen? Ami chinta korchilam payment process properly hoyeche ki na. Ami chinta korchilam apni phone e confirm korben ki na.
Target: Have you recently placed an online order? I was thinking whether the payment process went properly. I thought you will confirm over the phone.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe WhatsApp e call korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni busy thakben. Amar kache urgent product query ase, ami step by step explain korte chai.
Target: Will you have a WhatsApp call with me? I was thinking you might be busy. I have an urgent product query, and I want to explain step by step.

Text: Apni ki recently product delivery check korechen? Ami chinta korchilam sab kichu proper ase ki na. Ami chinta korchilam apni phone e feedback den.
Target: Have you recently checked the product delivery? I was thinking whether everything is proper. I thought you will give feedback over the phone.

Text: Apni ki amar sathe urgent phone call e discuss korben? Ami chinta korchilam apni available thakben ki na. Amar kache order return process ase, ami clearly explain korte chai.

Text: Ei shirt ta amar size e nei, ami return korbo. It's too big for me. I should have checked the size chart. I hope the return process is easy.
Target: This shirt is not my size, I will return it. It's too big for me. I should have checked the size chart. I hope the return process is easy.

Text: Cash dibo na, ami card diye pay korbo. It's more convenient. I don't carry much cash anymore. Most places accept cards now.
Target: I will not pay with cash, I will pay with my card. It's more convenient. I don't carry much cash anymore. Most places accept cards now.

Text: Sale cholche, new clothes kinte jabo. I need a new wardrobe. I'm excited to see what's on sale. I hope I find a good deal.
Target: There is a sale going on, I will go to buy new clothes. I need a new wardrobe. I'm excited to see what's on sale. I hope I find a good deal.

Text: Online e deal gulo khub bhalo thake. I always compare prices online. It's the best way to save money. I've found so many good deals.
Target: The deals are very good online. I always compare prices online. It's the best way to save money. I've found so many good deals.

Text: E-commerce site theke ami onek shari kini. The quality is good. They have so many designs to choose from. It's my favorite way to shop.
Target: I buy many saris from e-commerce sites. The quality is good. They have so many designs to choose from. It's my favorite way to shop.

Text: WhatsApp e group chat e onek jokes send korchi. My friends are laughing so hard. We've been chatting all day. It's a great way to stay in touch.
Target: I am sending many jokes in the WhatsApp group chat. My friends are laughing so hard. We've been chatting all day. It's a great way to stay in touch.

Text: Instagram e new photo upload korechi. I'm waiting for the likes to roll in. I hope my friends like it. I spent a long time editing it.
Target: I have uploaded a new photo on Instagram. I'm waiting for the likes to roll in. I hope my friends like it. I spent a long time editing it.

Text: Facebook ta khub slow kaj korche. I've been trying to load it for ages. I think there's a problem with my internet. I'll try again later.
Target: Facebook is working very slowly. I've been trying to load it for ages. I think there's a problem with my internet. I'll try again later.

Text: Missed call diechi, ami office e achi. I'll call you back as soon as I can. I'm in a meeting right now. It will be over soon.
Target: I gave a missed call, I am at the office. I'll call you back as soon as I can. I'm in a meeting right now. It will be over soon.

Text: TikTok e video banano ami shikhte chai. It looks so fun. My friends are all making them. I'll download the app and give it a try.
Target: I want to learn how to make videos on TikTok. It looks so fun. My friends are all making them. I'll download the app and give it a try.

Text: Trip er ticket kinechi, train e jabo. The journey will be long but fun. I'm excited to see the scenery. I've packed all my bags.
Target: I have bought the trip ticket, I will go by train. The journey will be long but fun. I'm excited to see the scenery. I've packed all my bags.

Text: Hotel booking korechi, on Sunday check-in korbo. I hope the room is nice. I've read good reviews about this hotel. It's located in a great area.
Target: I have booked a hotel, I will check-in on Sunday. I hope the room is nice. I've read good reviews about this hotel. It's located in a great area.

Text: Sightseeing er plan korechi. I'll visit all the famous landmarks. I've already made a list. I'm so excited for this trip.
Target: I have planned for sightseeing. I'll visit all the famous landmarks. I've already made a list. I'm so excited for this trip.

Text: Passport ta amar kache nei, bari te bhule eshechi. I'll have to go back and get it. My flight is in a few hours. This is so stressful.
Target: I don't have my passport with me, I forgot it at home. I'll have to go back and get it. My flight is in a few hours. This is so stressful.

Text: International flight ta late hobe. The weather is bad. The airport is closed for a while. I have to wait for an update.
Target: The international flight will be late. The weather is bad. The airport is closed for a while. I have to wait for an update.

Text: Class bunk korechi, movie dekhte jabo. I'm so bored in class. I've already seen this movie, but it's a good distraction. I'll make sure to catch up on my studies later.
Target: I have bunked class, I will go to watch a movie. I'm so bored in class. I've already seen this movie, but it's a good distraction. I'll make sure to catch up on my studies later.

Text: Exam stress er karon e kichu korte icche korche na. I just want to relax. I can't concentrate on anything. I've been studying for hours.
Target: I don't feel like doing anything because of exam stress. I just want to relax. I can't concentrate on anything. I've been studying for hours.

Text: Pubg e game ta hard chilo, ami lose korechi. I was so close to winning. My friends were so disappointed. We'll play again tomorrow.
Target: The game on PUBG was hard, I lost. I was so close to winning. My friends were so disappointed. We'll play again tomorrow.

Text: Hangout korbo, kintu taka nei. I'm so broke. I need to get a part-time job. Maybe my friends will pay for me.
Target: I will hangout, but I don't have any money. I'm so broke. I need to get a part-time job. Maybe my friends will pay for me.

Text: Group study korte hobe, kal ke exam. We have a lot of material to cover. I've already made a study guide. I hope we all pass.
Target: I need to do a group study, there is an exam tomorrow. We have a lot of material to cover. I've already made a study guide. I hope we all pass.

Text: Food panda theke order korechi, eagerly wait korchi. The food is taking forever. I'm so hungry I could eat a horse. I'll call them to check on my order.
Target: I have ordered from Foodpanda, I am eagerly waiting. The food is taking forever. I'm so hungry I could eat a horse. I'll call them to check on my order.

Text: Customer service er number ta de, ami call korbo. I need to complain about my order. They got it all wrong. I'm so annoyed.
Target: Give me the customer service number, I will call. I need to complain about my order. They got it all wrong. I'm so annoyed.

Text: Home cleaning service er rate koto? I need to get my apartment cleaned. It's been a while. I'll ask for a quote.
Target: What is the rate for home cleaning service? I need to get my apartment cleaned. It's been a while. I'll ask for a quote.

Text: Technical support e call korechi, laptop ta kaj korche na. The screen is black. I've tried everything. I hope they can fix it.
Target: I have called technical support, the laptop is not working. The screen is black. I've tried everything. I hope they can fix it.

Text: Courier service er tracking number ta lagbe. I need to track my package. It's been a week. I'm worried it got lost.
Target: I need the tracking number of the courier service. I need to track my package. It's been a week. I'm worried it got lost.

Text: Project ta deadline er age submit korte hobe. I'm so close to finishing it. I've been working on it for a month. I'm so relieved it's almost done.
Target: The project must be submitted before the deadline. I'm so close to finishing it. I've been working on it for a month. I'm so relieved it's almost done.

Text: Office meeting ta cancel hoye geche. I can go home early now. I'm so happy about this. I'll finally get some rest.
Target: The office meeting has been cancelled. I can go home early now. I'm so happy about this. I'll finally get some rest.

Text: Internship er offer ta ami accept korechi. I'm so excited to start. This will be a great learning experience. I've always wanted to work here.
Target: I have accepted the internship offer. I'm so excited to start. This will be a great learning experience. I've always wanted to work here.

Text: Presentation ta khub bhalo hoyeche. My boss was very impressed. My colleagues congratulated me. I'm proud of my work.
Target: The presentation went very well. My boss was very impressed. My colleagues congratulated me. I'm proud of my work.

Text: Thesis er research ta khub challenging. I've been working on it for a year. I've hit a roadblock. I need to consult with my professor.
Target: The thesis research is very challenging. I've been working on it for a year. I've hit a roadblock. I need to consult with my professor.

Text: Shubho Noboborsho! Pohela Boishakh er din shobai notun jama pore adda dey. Maach-bhaat kheye pet fule thake, ar mishti chara din shuru hoy na. Apni ki notun boi kinlen bazar theke? Shobai mile gaan-bajna kore anondo te matiye thaki.
Target: Happy Bengali New Year, yo! Everyone’s strutting in new threads, stuffing fish and rice till their bellies balloon, and mishti’s basically breakfast. Got a new book from the bazaar yet? We’re singing like Tollywood stars at a blockbuster party!

Text: Eid Mubarak! Eid er din biryani ar mangsho chara chhuti to pura noy. Apni ki eidgah te namaj porlen, naki ghor e adda dichchen? Bachcha ra paisa joma kore, ar boro ra khela-dhula kore. Shondha te shobai mile khaoa-daoa kore anondo hoy.
Target: Eid Mubarak, fam! No Eid’s complete without biryani mountains and meat feasts. Did you pray at the eidgah or just gossip at home? Kids collect cash like mini bankers, and we feast at night like foodie royalty!

Text: Durga Puja’r shubhechha! Puja te pandal ghura, phuchka khaoa, ar notun jama show-off kora must. Raat e apni ki kathi roll kheye adda dichchen? Ma Durga’r arati dekhe mon bhoray. Shobai mile utsab er maja nei.
Target: Happy Durga Puja! Pandal-hopping, phuchka-popping, and flexing new outfits is the vibe. You munching kathi rolls and gossiping at night? Ma Durga’s arati steals the show, and we party like the goddess RSVP’d!

Text: Kali Pujo’r pronaam! Kali pujo te diya jwala, patakha futa, ar mishti khaoa hoy. Apni ki raat e light er khela dekhte jaben? Bazar e notun jinish kini, shobai anonde matiye thake. Eta to puro utsab er mela!
Target: Kali Puja vibes! We light diyas, burst crackers, and scarf sweets like champs. You catching the nighttime light show? Bazaar shopping’s a must, and we’re lost in a sparkly festival frenzy!

Text: Bhaiphonta’r shubhokamona! Bhaiphonta te didi bhai er mathay tilak dey, dua kore. Bhai er pocket khali hoy gift dite dite. Apni ki bhai ke gift dichen, naki shudhu khabar khaben? Shobai mile khela-dhula kore, pet fule.
Target: Happy Bhaiphonta! Sisters slap tilak on brothers and pray, while brothers’ wallets weep from gifting. You giving your bro a gift or just raiding the feast? We eat till our bellies protest in this love-and-loot fest!

Text: Bhalo achen apni? Tui thik thak achish, na jhal muri te pet kharap korechish? Bondhu ra phone kore khobor ney, ar ma bolen doctor dekha. Ektu rest korle shob thik hoye jabe. Khabar e jhal kom kha!
Target: You holding up, or did that jhal muri launch a spicy gut rebellion? Friends call to check in, and mom’s yelling for a doc visit. Take a nap, and ease up on the chili bombs! You’ll survive this snack attack.

Text: Ektu rest kor! Din bhor kaaj kore apni to thakchhen na! Ma bolen bichanay shuye ektu ghumao. Pet bhore kheye sofa te boshe thaka shudhu kaaj na. Shorir ta ektu shanti chai!
Target: Chill out, champ! You’re working like a robot about to crash like a cheap laptop! Mom says nap it out. Eating and couch-potatoing isn’t enough—your body’s screaming for a timeout!

Text: Pani kha! Gorom e apni shukiye jachchen, pani kha na keno? Bondhu ra bolen, ektu jol kha, na hole hospital e jete hobe. Pet e jol na thakle shob kharap hoye jabe. Ekhon e glass niye kha!
Target: Hydrate, pal! You’re shriveling in this heat like a forgotten aloo! Friends nag you to chug water, or it’s hospital o’clock. No water, no life—grab a glass before you’re a human raisin!

Text: Doctor dekha apni! Jhor eseche, kintu apni to Google e shob jano! Ma bolen, doctor er kache ja, na hole shorir kharap hobe. Bondhu ra o bolen, ektu check-up kor. Tui ki hero, nijei thik hobey?
Target: Get to a doc, pronto! You’re coughing like a drama queen, but think Google’s your MD! Mom’s screaming for a doctor, and friends agree. Stop playing superhero—unless your power’s sneezing!

Text: Gym e ja! Mishti kheye kheye pet fulechhe, apni ki gym e jaben na? Bondhu ra hanshe, bolen tui to sofa king! Ektu exercise korle shorir fit thakbe. Chal, weights utha shuru kor!
Target: Hit the gym, champ! Those mishti marathons turned your belly into a balloon! Friends crown you sofa king, but sweat’ll keep you fit. Grab those weights before you roll away!

Text: Bus kobe asbe? Bus stop e dariye dariye shorir kharap hoye jachhe. Kolkata’r traffic to ekta nightmare, kichutei bus ashe na. Apni ki ektu wait korben, naki auto dhorben? Ar koto deri hobe?
Target: When’s the bus coming, or are we starring in a traffic jam reality show? Kolkata’s roads are a nightmare, and the bus is on a tea break. You waiting, or grabbing an auto? My legs are ready to quit!

Text: Auto te uth! Auto dhore na hole apni office late hoben, ar boss bolbe. Shohor e auto chara jawa mushkil, kintu jagga thake na. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu adjust kor. Chal, ekhon e dhor!
Target: Hop in the auto, or you’re sprinting to Narnia for work! Autos are city life, but packed like sardines. Friends say adjust, but it’s a circus. Squeeze in before you’re fired!

Text: Ticket kinechen apni? Train er ticket na thakle platform e adda marbo? Bazar e line e dariye ticket kina jaye. Bondhu ra bolen, online kin, kintu net slow. Apni ki ready na shudhu sapno dekchhen?
Target: Got your ticket, or we chilling on the platform like jobless poets? Station queues are brutal, and friends say book online, but the net’s a snail. You ready, or just dreaming of train adventures?

Text: Traffic e porlam! Office jete jete traffic e atkaye gelam, ar kichu hobe na. Kolkata’r rasta te jam to daily routine. Apni ki phone e bondhu der sathe adda dichchen? E to jibon atkaye gelo!
Target: Stuck in traffic! Heading to work, but the roads are a parking lot. Kolkata’s jams are daily torture. You gossiping with friends on the phone? Life’s stuck in this gridlock soap opera!

Text: Metro dhoro! Metro na dhorle apni to office e derite pouchhben! Kolkata’r metro te bhir holo, kintu fast. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu adjust kore nao. Chal, ekhon e platform e ja!
Target: Catch the metro, or you’ll be late enough to miss your own wedding! Kolkata’s metro is a crowded rocket. Friends say suck it up and squeeze in. Dash to the platform before you’re toast!

Text: Khide peyeche! Pet to puro kha kha korche, apni ki khaben ekhon? Maach-bhaat na thakle jibon adhoora. Bondhu ra bolen, cholo phuchka khete jai. Ekhon e khabar dorkar!
Target: I’m starving! My stomach’s roaring louder than a Tollywood hero! Fish and rice are life, or it’s half-lived. Friends say let’s hit the phuchka stall. Food, stat, or I’m staging a hunger strike!

Text: Murgi naki mangsho? Ghor e khabar banano niye apni ki bolben, murgi na mangsho? Family te shobai ek ek ta menu bole. Bondhu ra bolen, biryani banai felo! Kintu ki banabo, e to yudhho!
Target: Chicken or mutton? What’s your vote for dinner—poultry or goat? Family’s split like it’s a food election. Friends say whip up biryani! This menu debate’s a full-on culinary war!

Text: Phuchka kha! Apni ki phuchka khete jaben na, naki posh mohila? Kolkata’r rasta te phuchka to pran er khabar. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu jhal kha, moja hobe. Chal, ekhon e khete jai!
Target: Eat some phuchka, or you too fancy for street-side spice bombs? Phuchka’s the soul food of Kolkata’s streets. Friends say load up on the spice for kicks. Let’s scarf some now before we faint!

Text: Bill ta ke debe? Khabar shesh, kintu apni ki bill deben, naki adda chalbe? Restaurante shobai chup kore bill er dike takay. Bondhu ra bolen, keu ekjon hero hok! Ekhon e hishab koro!
Target: Who’s paying the bill, or are we washing dishes tonight? Dinner’s done, but everyone’s eyeing the check like it’s a bomb. Friends say someone be the hero! Settle up before we’re scrubbing plates!

Text: Ektu jhal hok! Apni ki bolben, khabar e jhal beshi hok na kom? Bengali khabar e jhal na thakle to moja nay. Waiter ke bolen, ektu jhal diye dao. Na hole to shudhu pani khaoa!
Target: Make it spicy, or it’s just flavored water! You want your food fiery or tame? Bengali grub needs that chili kick to shine. Tell the waiter to spice it up, or we’re just sipping sadness!

Text: Dam ta kom kor! Apni ki bolben, eta ki dam, puro pocket khali! Bazar e haggling to Bengali khela. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu try kor, kom hobe. Chal, ekhon e bargain shuru!
Target: Lower the price, or my wallet’s staging a walkout! Haggling’s the Bengali sport in markets. Friends say push harder, it’ll drop. Start bargaining now, or we’re broke by sundown!

Text: Delivery kobe asbe? Online order diye apni to wait korchen, kintu kobe asbe? Parcel na ashle pet khali thakbe. Bondhu ra bolen, track kor, naki ghumiye por! Kobe pabe, bolo to?
Target: When’s the delivery, or should I send a pigeon to check? You’re waiting for that online order, but it’s on a world tour. Friends say track it, don’t nap! When’s it landing, or are we starving?

Text: Cash naki card? Apni ki cash deben, naki card swipe korben? Shop e shobai hishab kore, kintu wallet khali. Bondhu ra bolen, digital hok, kintu net slow! Ki korben, bolo?
Target: Cash or card, or we bartering with mishti? You paying with notes or swiping? Shop’s waiting, but wallets are shy. Friends say go digital, but the net’s a snail! What’s the move?

Text: Size ache to? Apni ki notun jama kinben, kintu size thakbe to? Festive sale e shobai dhakka-dhukki kore. Bondhu ra bolen, try koro, na hole kid er size! Ki kinben, bolo!
Target: Got my size, or am I squeezing into a kid’s kurta? You’re shopping for new threads, but sizes are a gamble in sales. Friends say try it, or it’s toddler chic! What’s your pick?

Text: Return korbo ki? Online order ta thik nai, apni ki return korben? Jama ta to puro neon disaster! Bondhu ra bolen, pathiye dao, na hole ki hobey? Ekhon e decision nao!
Target: Return it, or wear this neon nightmare ironically? Your online order’s a flop, and that shirt’s glowing like a disco ball. Friends say send it back, or what’s next? Decide now before you blind someone!

Text: Kothay achen apni? Phone e apni kothay, naki kono jungle e haraye gechen? Bondhu ra khobor ney, kintu tui bolish na. Ma bolen, kothay thako, bolo! Ekhon e reply dao!
Target: Where you at, or lost in a jungle like a desi Tarzan? Friends call for a vibe check, but you’re MIA. Mom’s yelling, “Where are you?” Reply now, or we’re sending a search party!

Text: Ekta selfie patha! Apni ki selfie pathaben, naki camera bhoy peye geche? WhatsApp e bondhu ra wait kore. Filter diye photo perfect koro, na hole hanshbe! Chal, ekhon e click kor!
Target: Send a selfie, or is your camera scared of your face? Friends are waiting on WhatsApp for your glow-up. Slap on a filter, or they’ll roast you! Snap that pic now, superstar!

Text: Missed call de! Apni ki missed call diben, naki puro ghosting korben? Phone e balance kom, tai missed call love language. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu ring dao. Ekhon e call kor!
Target: Give a missed call, or you ghosting like a Bollywood villain? Phone balance is low, so missed calls are our love language. Friends say give a ring. Dial now, or you’re officially a phantom!

Text: Story dekhechen apni? Insta story ta apni dekhechen, naki phone off kore ghumochen? Bondhu ra bolen, like dao, na hole out of trend! Story te moja ache, dekho! Ekhon e check kor!
Target: Seen my story, or you living under a social media rock? Friends say hit that like, or you’re out of the trend loop! My story’s lit, check it out. Scroll now before you’re ancient history!

Text: Network nai! Phone e network nei, apni ki korchen ekhon? Video call atkaye gelo, ar bondhu ra bolen try koro. Kolkata’r network to lottery! Ekhon ki, pigeon pathabo?
Target: No network! Your phone’s in a dead zone, what you doing? Video call’s stuck, and friends say keep trying. Kolkata’s network is a gamble! Should we send a pigeon instead?

Text: Flight late hocche! Airport e apni wait korchen, kintu flight to aschhe na! Bondhu ra bolen, coffee khao, kintu koto khon? Luggage ready, kintu plane kothay? Ekhon ki korben?
Target: Flight’s delayed! You’re stuck at the airport, but the plane’s on vacation! Friends say grab a coffee, but for how long? Luggage is ready, but where’s the bird? What’s your move now?

Text: Hotel ta kemon? Apni ki hotel book korechen, naki tent lagaben? Room ta thik na hole shob moja noshto. Bondhu ra bolen, review check koro! Kemon lage, bolo to!
Target: How’s the hotel, or you pitching a tent instead? A bad room kills the travel vibe. Friends say check reviews first! Spill the tea—is it a palace or a haunted shack?

Text: Bus e jagga ache? Apni ki bus e uthben, naki roof e stunt korben? Intercity bus e bhir to normal, kintu seat dorkar. Bondhu ra bolen, book koro age. Jagga ache to, bolo!
Target: Any seats on the bus, or you riding the roof like a stunt star? Intercity buses are packed like sardines, but we need a seat. Friends say book early. Got space, or we’re hanging on?

Text: Ghure ashi! Apni ki sightseeing e jaben, naki hotel e phone e boshe thakben? Notun shohor e moja ache, kintu plan dorkar. Bondhu ra bolen, cholo ghuri! Ekhon e beriye por!
Target: Let’s go sightseeing, or you glued to your phone in the hotel? New cities are fun, but need a plan. Friends say let’s roam! Hit the streets now, or we’re just digital tourists!

Text: Photo tul! Apni ki photo tulben, naki trip ta bhule jaben? Travel e photo na thakle to proof nai. Bondhu ra bolen, selfie dao, na hole ki hobe! Ekhon e click kor!
Target: Take a pic, or we forgetting this trip ever happened? No photos, no proof you traveled. Friends say snap a selfie, or it’s pointless! Click now, or you’re just a travel ghost!

Text: Ki re, ki khobor? Apni ki khobor deben, naki shudhu bore korben? Adda te bondhu ra moja kore, kintu tui chup keno? Ghotona bolo, na hole ghumiye porbo! Chal, start koro!
Target: What’s the tea, or you just brewing boredom? Adda’s where friends spill the fun, but why you quiet? Share the gossip, or we’re napping! Kick off the chat, let’s roll!

Text: Chill korbo? Apni ki chill korte chaan, naki adulting e atkaye achen? Bondhu ra bolen, cholo adda mari, kintu time kothay? Coffee shop e meet kori? Ekhon e plan koro!
Target: Wanna chill, or stuck adulting against your will? Friends say let’s gossip, but where’s the time? Coffee shop meet-up? Plan now, or we’re doomed to boring uncle vibes!

Text: Crush ta kemne? Apni ki crush er sathe DM e kotha bolchen, naki fail? Bondhu ra tease kore, bolen update dao! Love story to drama lage. Ki hocche, bolo to!
Target: How’s your crush, or you still DM-sliding into oblivion? Friends tease and demand updates! Your love story’s a drama fest. Spill the beans—what’s cooking?

Text: Party korte hobe! Apni ki party te jaben, naki boring uncle mode on? Bondhu ra bolen, dance floor e ja, kintu tui ready? Night ta jomjomat hobe! Chal, plan kori!
Target: Gotta party, or you joining the boring uncle club? Friends say hit the dance floor, but you ready? The night’s gonna be lit! Let’s plan, or we’re stuck in snoozeville!

Text: Eta trending ache! Apni ki trend dekhechen, naki 90s e atkaye achen? Insta te shobai share kore, kintu tui kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, update hok! Ekhon e check koro!
Target: This is trending, or you stuck in the 90s dial-up era? Insta’s buzzing, but where you at? Friends say get with it! Check the trends now, or you’re a social media fossil!

Text: Khana kobe asbe? Apni ki food order korchen, kintu delivery kobe? Pet to khali, ar bondhu ra bolen track koro. Delay hole to uposh kore morbo! Kobe asbe, bolo!
Target: When’s the food landing, or am I fasting for world peace? You ordered, but where’s the grub? Friends say track it, but delays mean we’re starving! When’s it here, spill!

Text: Parcel ta pathao! Apni ki parcel expect korchen, kintu kothay gelo? Courier er delay to shohor er rasta lage. Bondhu ra bolen, call koro! Ekhon e khobor nao!
Target: Send the parcel, or it’s on a world tour? You’re waiting, but the courier’s lost in traffic. Friends say call them! Track it now, or we’re sending a homing pigeon!

Text: Wi-Fi thik koro! Apni ki Wi-Fi use korchen, kintu signal nei? Netflix atkaye gelo, ar bondhu ra bolen router check koro. Network na thakle to jibon off! Ekhon e fix koro!
Target: Fix the Wi-Fi, or I’m chatting with pigeons for updates! You’re online, but the signal’s gone. Netflix’s dead, and friends say check the router. No internet, no life—fix it now!

Text: Order cancel korbo? Apni ki order cancel korben, naki wait korben? Delivery app thik nai, ar khabar thanda hobe. Bondhu ra bolen, pathiye dao! Ekhon e decision nao!
Target: Cancel the order, or wait till I’m retired? The app’s a mess, and the food’ll be cold. Friends say ditch it! Decide now, or we’re eating disappointment for dinner!

Text: Extra sauce dao! Apni ki extra sauce chaan, naki khabar shukna khaben? Fast food e sauce na thakle to moja nay. Waiter ke bolen, beshi dao! Na hole to shudhu sadness!
Target: Extra sauce, or I’m eating this sadness dry? Fast food without sauce is a crime. Tell the waiter to pile it on! No sauce, no joy—just a plate of despair!

Text: Assignment shesh? Apni ki assignment shesh korechen, naki miracle er ashay? Deadline to kachakachi, ar bondhu ra bolen submit koro. Procrastination to Bengali khela! Ekhon e shuru koro!
Target: Finished the assignment, or praying for a miracle? Deadline’s creeping, and friends say submit already. Procrastination’s our game! Start now, or you’re doomed to a panic party!

Text: Exam e ki hobe? Apni ki exam er jonno ready, naki shudhu sapno dekchen? Pora to shuru korechen, kintu kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, wing it! Kintu ki hobe, bolo to!
Target: What’s gonna happen in the exam, or you just winging it like SRK? You studied, but where’s the proof? Friends say fake it till you make it! Spill—what’s the game plan?

Text: Meeting ta kobe? Apni ki meeting er time janen, naki Zoom e ghumoben? Office e shobai plan kore, kintu time bhule jaye. Bondhu ra bolen, calendar check koro! Kobe, bolo to!
Target: When’s the meeting, or you napping through Zoom? Office plans, but time’s a mystery. Friends say check your calendar! Spill the deets—when’s this snoozefest happening?

Text: Project ta ready? Apni ki project shesh korechen, naki shudhu vibes debe? Deadline e shobai panic kore, kintu tui kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, slide banai felo! Ekhon e kaaj shuru!
Target: Is the project ready, or you presenting a PowerPoint of vibes? Deadline’s got everyone panicking, but where you at? Friends say whip up some slides! Start now, or it’s a vibe-only disaster!

Text: Sir ki bollen? Apni ki sir er kotha bujhechen, naki ancient script? Class ba meeting e shobai note ney, kintu tui chup. Bondhu ra bolen, bolo ki holo! Ekhon e share koro!
Target: What’d the teacher/boss say, or we decoding ancient scrolls? Everyone’s taking notes in class or meetings, but you’re silent. Friends say spill the tea! Share now, or we’re lost in translation!

Text: Shubho Bijoya! Durga Puja shesh hole apni ki shubho bijoya bolben? Pandal ghurte ghurte shorir thake, kintu anondo thame na. Shobai mile mishti kheye adda dey. Eta to bhalobasar samay!
Target: Happy Bijoya! Puja’s done—gonna wish everyone or just collapse from pandal-hopping? We’re stuffed with sweets and gossip. It’s the season of love and sugar comas!

Text: Pohela Falgun er shubhechha! Basantotsav e apni ki fuler dress porben? Rang berong er din, shobai mile adda ar gaan kore. College e bhalo lage, kintu mishti kothay? Shundor din, moja koro!
Target: Happy Pohela Falgun! Rocking a floral fit for spring fest? It’s a colorful day of songs and adda. Where’s the mishti, though? Live it up, it’s a vibe!

Text: Rabindra Jayanti’r pronaam! Rabindranath er din apni ki kobita porben? School ba college e program hoy, ar shobai mile gaan gay. Mishti kheye adda dei, kintu homework bhule jai. Eta to Bengali din!
Target: Rabindra Jayanti vibes! Reciting poems for Tagore’s day, or just faking it? School’s got programs, and we sing like pros. Sweets and chats, but homework? Forgotten! It’s a Bengali soul day!

Text: Jamai Shoshti’r shubhokamona! Apni ki jamai ke khabar deben, naki shudhu adda? Shashuri mishti ar khabar banay, jamai pet bhore kheye. Family mile moja kore. Eta to khaoa-daoa’r din!
Target: Happy Jamai Shoshti! Feeding the son-in-law or just gossiping? Mom-in-law cooks a feast, and he eats till he pops. Family fun galore! It’s the official day of stuffing faces!

Text: Rakhi Bandhan er shubhechha! Apni ki bhai er hate rakhi bandhben? Bhai gift dite dite faaki dey, kintu khabar to must. Shobai mile adda ar hasi kore. Eta bhalobasar bandhan!
Target: Happy Rakhi! Tying a rakhi on your bro’s wrist, or just looting his wallet? He dodges gifts, but the feast is non-negotiable. We laugh and bond. It’s love wrapped in thread!

Text: Shorir thik ache apni? Gorom e apni thik achen, naki shorir bolche rest? Ma bolen, thanda pani khao, na hole jhor asbe. Bondhu ra bolen, doctor dekha. Ektu shanti koro!
Target: You feeling okay, or is your body begging for a break in this heat? Mom says chug cold water, or a fever’s coming. Friends push for a doc visit. Chill, or you’re toast!

Text: Ektu ghumao! Apni raat jaga korchen, kintu chokh to lal! Bondhu ra bolen, ektu bichanay shuye thako. Kaaj to thakbe, kintu shorir nosto hobe na. Ghum ekhon e dorkar!
Target: Catch some Z’s! You’re burning the midnight oil, but your eyes are screaming SOS! Friends say hit the bed. Work can wait—don’t let your body file for bankruptcy!

Text: Vitamin khao! Apni ki fruit kheye vitamin nichchen, naki shudhu mishti? Ma bolen, shak-shobji khao, shorir bhalo thakbe. Bondhu ra bolen, tablet khao. Ekhon e shuru koro!
Target: Pop some vitamins! You eating fruit or just mainlining mishti? Mom says load up on veggies for health. Friends suggest tablets. Start now, or you’re a walking sugar cube!

Text: Yoga koro apni! Shorir fit rakhte apni ki yoga korben? Bondhu ra bolen, ektu stretch koro, na hole sofa e boshe thakbe. Ma bolen, subhe utho. Chal, ekhon e shuru!
Target: Do some yoga! Keeping fit, or just planning to? Friends say stretch, or you’re glued to the sofa. Mom says wake up early. Start now, or you’re a couch potato forever!

Text: Thanda kheyechho? Apni ki thanda kheye shorir kharap korlen? Kolkata’r gorom e ice cream moja, kintu pet kharap hoy. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu care koro. Ekhon e rest koro!
Target: Caught a cold? Did you scarf ice cream and wreck yourself? Kolkata’s heat makes it tempting, but your tummy’s not happy. Friends say take it easy. Rest now, or you’re sneezing for days!

Text: Rickshaw dhorben apni? Office jete apni ki rickshaw dhorben, naki paidal? Rasta te jam thakle shob late. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu taratari beriye poro. Chal, ekhon e cholo!
Target: Grabbing a rickshaw? Heading to work, or walking like a pilgrim? Traffic jams mean you’re late. Friends say leave early. Move now, or you’re stuck in road hell!

Text: Train ta kobe? Apni ki train er time janen, naki platform e wait? Station e bhir, ar ticket counter e line. Bondhu ra bolen, online check koro. Kobe pouchhben, bolo!
Target: When’s the train? You know the schedule, or camping at the platform? Station’s a zoo, and ticket lines are brutal. Friends say check online. When you reaching, spill!

Text: Cycle chalan apni! Apni ki cycle chaliye office jaben, naki bus? Gorom e cycle moja, kintu shorir thake. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu fitness koro. Chal, ekhon e pedal maro!
Target: Ride a cycle! You biking to work, or stuck on a bus? Cycling’s fun in the heat, but it’s a workout. Friends say get fit. Pedal now, or you’re just dreaming of abs!

Text: Auto te bhir keno? Apni ki auto te uthben, kintu jagga nai? Kolkata’r auto te shobai adjust kore, kintu moja thake. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu push koro. Ekhon e dhorben ki?
Target: Why’s the auto packed? You squeezing in, or is there no room? Kolkata’s autos are a circus, but fun. Friends say push through. You hopping in now or walking to Narnia?

Text: Taxi book koro! Apni ki taxi book korben, naki wait korben? Shohor e taxi na thakle jibon atke. Bondhu ra bolen, app use koro. Ekhon e call koro, na hole late!
Target: Book a taxi! You grabbing one, or waiting forever? No taxi, and the city grinds to a halt. Friends say use the app. Call now, or you’re late till next Puja!

Text: Khana banaben apni? Apni ki ghor e khana banaben, naki order? Ma bolen, ranna koro, kintu time kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, cholo dhaba te jai. Ki khaben, bolo to!
Target: Cooking dinner? You whipping up a feast, or ordering out? Mom says cook, but where’s the time? Friends say hit the dhaba. What’s on the menu, spill!

Text: Roll kha! Apni ki kathi roll khete jaben, naki ghor e boshe thakben? Kolkata’r roll to famous, moja lage. Bondhu ra bolen, ektu spicy koro. Chal, ekhon e khete jai!
Target: Grab a roll! You hitting up a kathi roll joint, or stuck at home? Kolkata’s rolls are legendary and spicy. Friends say make it fiery. Let’s chow down now!

Text: Khabar ready? Restaurante apni ki order korben, kintu ready kobe? Waiter bolen, ektu wait, kintu pet khidey morche. Bondhu ra bolen, taratari bolo! Kobe asbe, bolo!
Target: Food ready yet? You ordered at the restaurant, but when’s it coming? Waiter says wait, but your stomach’s rioting. Friends say hurry them up! When’s it landing, tell me!

Text: Mishti khao! Apni ki mishti khete chaan, naki diet e achen? Bengali chara mishti to incomplete. Bondhu ra bolen, rosogolla khao! Ekhon e shop e jao!
Target: Eat some sweets! You craving mishti, or pretending to diet? No Bengali’s complete without sweets. Friends say grab a rosogolla! Hit the shop now, or you’re missing life!

Text: Thali niben apni? Restaurante apni ki thali khaben, naki alada? Thali te shob moja, kintu pet fule jabe. Bondhu ra bolen, shuru koro! Ki khaben, bolo to!
Target: Getting a thali? You going for the full platter, or picking and choosing? Thali’s a flavor bomb, but your belly might explode. Friends say dive in! What’s your pick, spill!

Text: Notun jama kinen! Apni ki festive sale e jama kinben? Bazar e bhir, kintu deal miss korben na. Bondhu ra bolen, try koro, size thakbe. Ekhon e shopping shuru!
Target: Buy new clothes! You hitting the festive sale for threads? Market’s a zoo, but deals are gold. Friends say try for size. Start shopping now, or you’re stuck in last year’s look!

Text: Discount deben apni? Shop e apni ki discount chaben, naki full pay? Bargaining to Bengali khela, kintu shopkeeper strong. Bondhu ra bolen, try koro! Ekhon e dam komao!
Target: Got a discount? You bargaining, or paying full like a rookie? Haggling’s a Bengali sport, but shopkeepers are pros. Friends say push harder! Slash that price now!

Text: Order ta thik ache? Apni ki online order check korchen, naki blind trust? Parcel thik na hole to shob noshto. Bondhu ra bolen, track koro. Ekhon e khobor nao!
Target: Order look right? You checking your online haul, or trusting blindly? Wrong parcel, and it’s game over. Friends say track it. Get the scoop now, or cry later!

Text: Cash on delivery? Apni ki COD korben, naki card e pay? Delivery guy wait kore, kintu wallet khali. Bondhu ra bolen, online koro. Ki korben, bolo to!
Target: Cash on delivery? You paying cash, or swiping a card? Delivery guy’s waiting, but your wallet’s shy. Friends say go digital. What’s the plan, spill!

Text: Quality check koro! Apni ki jinish check korben, naki shudhu kinben? Online shopping e quality na thakle to dhoka. Bondhu ra bolen, review dekho. Ekhon e check koro!
Target: Check the quality! You inspecting the goods, or just buying blind? Online shopping’s a gamble if it’s junk. Friends say read reviews. Scrutinize now, or regret forever!

Text: Phone ta kothay? Apni ki phone uthben, naki miss korben? Bondhu ra call kore, kintu tui kothay? Ma bolen, reply dao, na hole tension. Ekhon e pick koro!
Target: Where’s your phone? You answering, or letting it ring to Narnia? Friends call, but you’re MIA. Mom says reply, or she’s stressed. Pick up now, or you’re in trouble!

Text: Text pathao! Apni ki WhatsApp e text korben, naki silent mode? Bondhu ra wait kore, kintu tui chup keno? Reply na korle to roast korbe! Ekhon e message pathao!
Target: Send a text! You chatting on WhatsApp, or in silent ninja mode? Friends are waiting, but you’re quiet. No reply, and they’ll roast you! Fire off a message now!

Text: Call back koro! Apni ki call back korben, naki bhulben? Bondhu ra bolen, phone koro, kintu network thake na. Ma bolen, khobor dao. Ekhon e ring dao!
Target: Call back! You returning that call, or forgetting like a pro? Friends say ring them, but network’s a mess. Mom says check in. Dial now, or you’re ghosted!

Text: Post ta dekho! Apni ki Insta post dekhechen, naki off-grid? Bondhu ra share kore, kintu tui kothay? Like na korle to out of loop! Ekhon e scroll koro!
Target: Check the post! You seen that Insta gem, or living off-grid? Friends are sharing, but where you at? No like, and you’re out of the loop! Scroll now, or you’re a social dinosaur!

Text: Emoji pathao! Apni ki emoji diye reply deben, naki boring text? WhatsApp e shobai emoji te kotha bole. Bondhu ra bolen, fun koro! Ekhon e kichu pathao!
Target: Send an emoji! You replying with emojis, or boring text? WhatsApp’s all about the smiley game. Friends say make it fun! Toss some emojis now, or you’re a chat snooze!

Text: Resort book koro! Apni ki resort book korben, naki ghor e thakben? Travel plan korle shob moja, kintu budget kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, deal dekho. Ekhon e book koro!
Target: Book a resort! You reserving a getaway, or stuck at home? Travel plans are fun, but where’s the cash? Friends say hunt for deals. Book now, or you’re couch-bound!

Text: Local train e jao! Apni ki local train e ghuroben, naki taxi? Shohor er bahire jete train e moja, kintu bhir. Bondhu ra bolen, ticket koro. Ekhon e platform e jao!
Target: Catch the local train! You riding the train, or splurging on a taxi? Out-of-town trips are fun, but crowded. Friends say grab a ticket. Hit the platform now!

Text: Picnic plan koro! Apni ki picnic plan korben, naki sofa e? Bondhu ra bolen, cholo shohor chhere jai. Khabar ar moja niye shuru koro. Ekhon e plan shuru!
Target: Plan a picnic! You organizing a picnic, or glued to the sofa? Friends say escape the city. Pack food and fun. Start planning now, or you’re a homebody forever!

Text: Guide ke bolo! Apni ki guide er sathe sightseeing korben? Notun shohor e guide na thakle harano easy. Bondhu ra bolen, local ke jiggesh koro. Ekhon e ghura shuru!
Target: Talk to the guide! You sightseeing with a guide, or wandering blind? New cities are tricky without locals. Friends say ask around. Start exploring now, or you’re lost in nowhereville!

Text: Map dekho! Apni ki map dekhe thik korben kothay jaben? Travel e map na thakle to bondhu ra hanshbe. Bondhu ra bolen, GPS on koro. Ekhon e direction dekho!
Target: Check the map! You navigating with a map, or just guessing? No map, and friends will roast you. They say turn on GPS. Figure out the route now, or you’re circling forever!

Text: Plan ki re? Apni ki bondhu der sathe plan korchen, naki solo? Adda te shobai moja kore, kintu tui kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, cholo hangout kori! Ekhon e kichu thik koro!
Target: What’s the plan, bro? You scheming with friends, or going lone wolf? Adda’s where the fun’s at, but where you hiding? Friends say let’s hang. Sort it now, or you’re a vibe killer!

Text: Coffee shop e jai! Apni ki coffee shop e adda deben, naki ghor e? Bondhu ra bolen, cholo coffee khete jai. Moja ar gossip to must! Ekhon e beriye por!
Target: Hit the coffee shop! You gossiping over coffee, or stuck at home? Friends say let’s grab a brew. Fun and tea-spilling are non-negotiable! Head out now, or miss the buzz!

Text: Movie dekha jabe? Apni ki bondhu der sathe movie dekhte jaben? Hall e popcorn khete khete moja lage. Bondhu ra bolen, ticket book koro. Ekhon e plan koro!
Target: Catch a movie? You watching a flick with friends, or what? Popcorn in the theater’s pure joy. Friends say book tickets. Plan now, or you’re stuck with reruns!

Text: Status update dao! Apni ki WhatsApp status deben, naki chupchap? Bondhu ra wait kore, kintu tui kothay? Moja’r kichu post koro, na hole roast! Ekhon e update dao!
Target: Drop a status update! You posting on WhatsApp, or staying silent? Friends are waiting, but where you at? Share something fun, or get roasted! Update now, or you’re social roadkill!

Text: Selfie group e pathao! Apni ki group e selfie pathaben, naki hide korben? Bondhu ra bolen, photo dao, na hole boring. Filter lagao, ar moja koro! Ekhon e click kor!
Target: Send a group selfie! You sharing a snap, or hiding like a ninja? Friends say post a pic, or you’re boring. Slap on a filter and shine! Click now, or you’re out of the squad!

Text: Food order koro! Apni ki ekhon food order korben, naki uposh? App e shob thanda, kintu pet to khali. Bondhu ra bolen, taratari koro! Ekhon e order dao!
Target: Order food! You getting grub now, or fasting like a monk? The app’s slow, but your stomach’s screaming. Friends say hurry up! Place that order, or starve dramatically!

Text: Courier kothay? Apni ki courier track korchen, naki bhule gechen? Parcel na ashle to shopping adhoora. Bondhu ra bolen, call koro. Ekhon e khobor nao!
Target: Where’s the courier? You tracking that parcel, or forgot it exists? No delivery, no shopping joy. Friends say call them. Check now, or your package is on a world tour!

Text: Internet slow keno? Apni ki internet use korchen, kintu speed nei? Netflix load kore na, ar bondhu ra bolen router restart. Shob atkaye, jibon off! Ekhon e fix koro!
Target: Why’s the internet slow? You online, but the speed’s a snail? Netflix won’t load, and friends say restart the router. Everything’s stuck, life’s offline! Fix it now, or we’re back in the 90s!

Text: Order ta confirm koro! Apni ki order confirm korben, naki wait? App e glitch, ar khabar thanda hobe. Bondhu ra bolen, ekhon e koro! Na hole to khali pet!
Target: Confirm the order! You locking it in, or waiting till Doomsday? App’s glitchy, and the food’ll be cold. Friends say do it now! Confirm, or it’s an empty stomach tragedy!

Text: Fast delivery dao! Apni ki bolben, delivery taratari pathao? Khabar thanda hole to moja nay. Bondhu ra bolen, call koro, taratari koro! Ekhon e push koro!
Target: Fast delivery, please! You telling them to hurry, or what? Cold food’s a crime. Friends say call and rush them! Push now, or we’re eating sadness!

Text: Pora shesh korechen apni? Exam kachakachi, apni ki porechen? Bondhu ra bolen, ektu try koro, na hole fail! Ma bolen, raat jaga bandho. Ekhon e book kholo!
Target: Done studying? Exam’s close, you hitting the books? Friends say try, or you’re flunking! Mom says stop pulling all-nighters. Open that book now, or face the fail!

Text: Presentation ready? Apni ki presentation banayechen, naki vibes e? Boss ba sir bolen, submit koro, kintu tui kothay? Bondhu ra bolen, slide banai felo! Ekhon e kaaj shuru!
Target: Presentation ready? You got slides, or just vibes? Boss or teacher says submit, but where you at? Friends say whip up something! Start now, or it’s a disaster show!

Text: Deadline kobe? Apni ki deadline janen, naki bhule gechen? Office ba college e shobai panic kore. Bondhu ra bolen, calendar dekho. Ekhon e plan koro!
Target: When’s the deadline? You know it, or totally forgot? Office or college is a panic zone. Friends say check your calendar. Plan now, or you’re sunk!

Text: Notes dao apni! Apni ki class er notes deben, naki hide korben? Bondhu ra bolen, share koro, na hole exam e morbo. Ma bolen, pora shuru koro. Ekhon e pathao!
Target: Share the notes! You passing class notes, or hoarding like a dragon? Friends say share, or we’re doomed in exams. Mom says start studying. Send them now, or we’re toast!

Text: Meeting e bolo! Apni ki meeting e kotha bolben, naki chup thakben? Boss er kache point korte hobe, kintu tui ready? Bondhu ra bolen, practice koro! Ekhon e shuru koro!
Target: Speak up in the meeting! You talking, or staying mute? Gotta impress the boss, but you ready? Friends say rehearse! Start now, or you’re just a silent statue!

Text: আপনি কি আজকে ভালো feel করছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম আপনি properly rest নিয়েছেন কি না। যদি আপনি free থাকেন, আমরা একটু coffee করতে যেতে পারি।
Target: Are you feeling well today? I was thinking whether you have rested properly. If you are free, we can go out for coffee.

Text: Good morning! আপনি কি breakfast করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly ready আছে কি না। আজকের দিনটা কেমন যাবে তা জানতে চাই।
Target: Good morning! Have you had breakfast? I was thinking whether everything is properly ready. I want to know how your day will go.

Text: আপনি কি আজকে office যাবেন on time? আমি ভাবছিলাম traffic properly manageable হবে কি না। যদি late হয়ে যান, আমাকে message দিতে পারেন।
Target: Will you go to the office on time today? I was thinking whether traffic will be manageable. If you are late, you can send me a message.

Text: Hello! আপনি কি recently কিছু important কাজ complete করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly done আছে কি না। কাজ শেষ হলে আমরা discuss করতে পারি।
Target: Hello! Have you recently completed any important tasks? I was thinking whether everything is properly done. We can discuss once the work is finished.

Text: আপনি কি আজকে friends সঙ্গে hangout করবেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সবাই properly free আছে কি না। যদি আমি join করতে চাই, তাহলে কি সম্ভব হবে?
Target: Will you hang out with friends today? I was thinking whether everyone is free. If I want to join, will it be possible?

Text: Hi! আপনি কি আজকে meeting attend করবেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly ready আছে কি না। Meeting শেষে আমরা একটু relax করতে পারি।
Target: Hi! Will you attend the meeting today? I was thinking whether everything is properly ready. After the meeting, we can relax a bit.

Text: আপনি কি recently কিছু shopping করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly buy করেছেন কি না। যদি নতুন কিছু recommend করতে চান, আমি শুনতে চাই।
Target: Have you recently done some shopping? I was thinking whether you have bought everything properly. If you want to recommend something new, I would like to hear.

Text: আপনি কি আজকে lunch break নেবেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly prepared আছে কি না। Lunch শেষে আমরা একটু walk করতে পারি।
Target: Will you take a lunch break today? I was thinking whether everything is properly prepared. After lunch, we can take a little walk.

Text: Hey! আপনি কি recently social media check করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly updated আছে কি না। নতুন news update জানালে ভালো লাগবে।
Target: Hey! Have you recently checked social media? I was thinking whether everything is properly updated. It would be nice if you tell me about any new updates.

Text: আপনি কি আজকে evening tea নেবেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly ready আছে কি না। যদি আপনি চান, আমরা বাইরে যেতে পারি।
Target: Will you have evening tea today? I was thinking whether everything is properly ready. If you want, we can go outside.

Text: Good evening! আপনি কি dinner already করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly ready আছে কি না। Dinner শেষে আমরা একটু movie দেখতে পারি।
Target: Good evening! Have you had dinner already? I was thinking whether everything is properly ready. After dinner, we can watch a movie.

Text: আপনি কি recently কিছু personal work complete করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly done আছে কি না। কাজ শেষে আমরা একটু relax করতে পারি।
Target: Have you recently completed any personal work? I was thinking whether everything is properly done. After finishing work, we can relax a bit.

Text: আপনি কি আজকে coffee break নেবেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly ready আছে কি না। যদি চাইলে আমরা coffee নিয়ে short walk করতে পারি।
Target: Will you take a coffee break today? I was thinking whether everything is properly ready. If you want, we can take a short walk with coffee.

Text: Hi! আপনি কি recently কিছু fun activity plan করেছেন? আমি ভাবছিলাম সব properly organized আছে কি না। যদি পারি, আমি join করতে চাই।
Target: Hi! Have you recently planned any fun activity? I was thinking whether everything is properly organized. If possible, I would like to join.

Text: সকালে আমি ঘুম থেকে উঠে হালকা ব্যায়াম করেছি। তারপর দুধ ও বিস্কুট দিয়ে নাশতা করেছি। অফিসের জন্য প্রস্তুতি নিয়ে বেরিয়েছি। বিকেলে বাড়ি ফিরে পড়াশোনা করেছি এবং পরিবারের সঙ্গে সময় কাটিয়েছি।
Target: In the morning, I woke up and did light exercise. Then I had breakfast with milk and biscuits. I got ready for the office. In the evening, I studied after returning home and spent time with my family.

Text: আজকে আমি বন্ধুদের সঙ্গে বাজারে গিয়েছিলাম। আমরা প্রয়োজনীয় জিনিসপত্র কিনেছি এবং কিছু পানি খেয়েছি। বিকেলে বাড়ি ফিরে রান্নাঘরে সাহায্য করেছি।
Target: Today I went to the market with friends. We bought necessary items and drank some water. In the afternoon, I returned home and helped in the kitchen.

Text: আজকে আমি বাগানে গাছপালা পানি দিয়েছি এবং মাটি খুঁড়ে কিছু নতুন গাছ লাগিয়েছি। পরিবারের সবাই সাহায্য করেছে। বিকেলে সবাই বিশ্রাম নিয়েছে।
Target: Today I watered the plants in the garden and dug the soil to plant new ones. The family helped. In the evening, everyone rested.

Text: সকালে ঘুম থেকে উঠে আমি দই ও ফল দিয়ে নাশতা করেছি। তারপর কিছু পানি খেয়েছি এবং অফিসের জন্য প্রস্তুতি নিয়েছি।
Target: In the morning, I had breakfast with yogurt and fruits. Then I drank some water and got ready for the office.

Text: আজকে আমি রোদে গিয়ে পরিস্কার করে ছাদ ধুয়ে নিয়েছি। এরপর কিছু পানি খেয়েছি এবং রান্নাঘরে সাহায্য করেছি।
Target: Today I cleaned and washed the roof in the sun. Then I drank some water and helped in the kitchen.

Text: সকালে আমি ঘর পরিষ্কার করেছি এবং ধুলা ঝাড়িয়েছি। তারপর নাশতা প্রস্তুত করেছি। পরিবারের সবাই খাওয়া শেষ করলে আমি পড়াশোনায় মন দিয়েছি।
Target: In the morning, I cleaned the house and dusted. Then I prepared breakfast. After everyone finished eating, I focused on studying.

Text: আজকে আমি বাজারে গিয়ে মাছ ও মাংস কিনেছি। এরপর বাড়ি ফিরে রান্নাঘরে সাহায্য করেছি। বিকেলে পরিবারের সঙ্গে খাওয়া শেষে বিশ্রাম নিয়েছি।

Text: আজকে আমি বন্ধুদের সঙ্গে শহরের নতুন পার্কে গিয়েছিলাম। আমরা হাঁটাহাঁটি করেছি এবং অনেক ছবি তুলেছি। পিকনিক স্পটে বসে খাওয়া করেছি। বিকেলে কাছের কফি শপে গিয়ে চা খেয়েছি। শেষে বাড়ি ফিরে বিশ্রাম নিয়েছি।

Text: আজকে আমি বন্ধুদের সঙ্গে শহরের নতুন রেস্টুরেন্টে লাঞ্চ করেছি। খাওয়া শেষে গল্প করেছি। দুপুরে সবাই আলাদা হয়ে গেছে।
